00051 bool cmaildir::create( const string & n, bool op )
00052 {
00053         if( n.empty() ) 
00054                 throw logic_error("cmaildir::create got empty maildir's name");
00055         if( mkdir( n.c_str(), 0700 )
00056             || mkdir((n+"/cur").c_str(), 0700)
00057             || mkdir((n+"/new").c_str(), 0700)
00058             || mkdir((n+"/tmp").c_str(), 0700) ) {
00059                 err = strerror(errno);
00060                 return false;
00061         }
00062         err = "";
00063         return op ? open(n) : true;
00064 }
00065 
00070 bool cmaildir::open( const string & md )
00071 {
00072         if( isopen && ! close() ) return false; 
00073         if( ! (dcur = opendir((md+"/cur").c_str()))
00074             || ! (dnew = opendir((md+"/new").c_str()))
00075             || ! (dtmp = opendir((md+"/tmp").c_str())) ) {
00076                 err = strerror(errno);
00077                 return false;
00078         }
00079         isopen = true;
00080         name = md;
00081         err = "";
00082         return true;
00083 }
00084 
00090 bool cmaildir::rm()
00091 {
00092         if( ! isopen )
00093                 throw logic_error("cmaildir::rm: maildir isn't opened");
00094         if( ! close() ) return false;
00095         try {
00096                 cutil::rmdirrec( name );
00097         } catch( const cutil_error & e ) {
00098                 err = e.what();
00099                 return false;
00100         }
00101         return true;
00102 }
00103 
00109 bool cmaildir::close()
00110 {
00111         if( ! isopen )
00112                 throw logic_error("cmaildir::close: maildir isn't opened");
00113         if( closedir(dcur) || closedir(dnew) || closedir(dtmp) ) {
00114                 err = strerror(errno);
00115                 return false;
00116         }
00117         isopen = false;
00118         return true;
00119 }

00129 bool cmaildir::lsdir( const string & n, deque<string> & fs, bool app )
00130 {
00131         if( n.empty() ) throw logic_error("cmaildir::lsdir: n is empty");
00132         if( ! app ) fs.clear();
00133 }
